events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me. I would like to request a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding return and money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Alex for handling the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting customer support. I understand you'd like a refund for the jacket. I'll be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can proceed with the return process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the jacket is too small for me. I prefer a refund since an exchange won’t work.
Thank you for the information. We can start your refund process. Please ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid label I'll email you shortly.
Thanks for your help! I appreciate the prepaid label; I will send the jacket back today and expect the refund soon.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the refund successfully. Please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.
Since you haven’t responded, we will close this case now. Thank you for reaching out, and have a great day!
